Title: Xaml Helpmeet 2013
Description: Xaml Helpmeet 2013 is a Visual Studio 2013 extension with powerful tools to help developers write Xaml code.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Xaml Helpmeet 2013 (XHM) is an update to Xaml Helpmeet to make it available to users of Visual Studio 2013. At this time the main code of both is the same, so you should look there for support and documentation. We will eventually try to duplicate the support here, but that may take some time.

Thank you for your patience.
